chapter.title: Step 2. Simple Logging Facade for Java library download
chapter.para: log4jdbc uses Simple Logging Facade for Java (SLF4J) to flexibly integrate with logging service used in application. Therefore, download the following files from http://www.slf4j.org/dist and copy them to [Anyframe installation folder] or [Web Root/WEB-INF/lib folder]. When using Weblogic JNDIDataSource, copy it to the relevant WAS classpath so that it can be loaded at WAS beginning.
